Title: Relates to providing valid government issued photo identification when casting a ballot
Summary: Requires a valid government issued photo identification card be presented when casting a ballot; provides for persons eligible for Medicaid to receive identification cards.
LawCode: Amd ยง8-303, El L; amd ยง491, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring a valid government issued photo identification card to be presented when casting a ballot
